Name: Chronicles of Mystery - The Tree of Life
About the game: When knowledge becomes lethal Find the legendary Tree of Life, which grants immortality to whoever tastes it’s fruits. Your search will lead you across the channels of Venice, through the dark alleys of Cairo and further into the unknown. Chased by ruthless assassins, you will have to solve ancient riddles and face a power that eludes the rules of logic. • Exciting, compelling story featuring Sylvie Leroux, a young archaeologist • Challenging puzzles requiring wits and logical thinking • Detailed, eye catching graphics
